item.title: Send Mail Using Gmail using Command Line
item.description: Yeah, you can send mail from your gmail account using command line. Requirements You have two options here. Gmail account settings Either enable less secure apps in your Google account or Generate an app password . Tools being used For Arch Linux: $ sudo pacman -S msmtp For Debian, Ubuntu and other Debian derived distributions: $ sudo apt install -y msmtp For Fedora, CentOS, Redhat etc: $ sudo dnf install msmtp Encrypt password Using gpg, we are going to encrypt our password.
